EnhanceR Symposium 2024

Research IT contribution to FAIRness

Preliminary Timetable

EnhanceR Symposium 2024 will take place at the Empa-Akademie on Thursday, November 7th, 2024.

If you are registered, you will receive all news about the schedule by email.

Overview schedule
9:30–10:00 Registration / Coffee
10:00–10:15 Welcome
10:15–11:00 Keynote: Implementing the FAIR Principles: Progress and Problems (Mark Wilkinson)
11:00–11:30 Plenary: Renku 2.0: Code, data and compute in the same platform for FAIR research (Elisabet Capon + Laura Kinkead)
11:30–12:00 Teaser Talks: Short presentations of show-and-tell topics
12:00–13:00 Show-and-tell parallel sessions 1–2
13:00–14:00 Lunch
14:00–14:30 Keynote: Building FAIR research repositories in practice (Lars Holm Nielsen, virtual talk)
14:30–15:00 Plenary: Building an RSE community in the ETH domain and steps towards a Swiss wide RSE community (Tarun Chadha + Uwe Schmitt)
15:00–15:30 Plenary: TBD (Giovanni Pizzi)
15:30–17:00 Show-and-tell parallel sessions 3–5
17:00–17:10 Farewell

Preliminary Show-and-tell List

Specific time slots for presentations coming soon!

  • A Platform for Simplifying and Accelerating Researcher Health Data Requests (Aleksandar Bobic)
  • Assisting FAIRness lifecycle: SMART-metrics for FAIR research data lifecycle management (Federico Grasso Toro)
  • Cloud deployments for research projects (Simone Baffelli)
  • Cloud storage and backup for research data (Jarunan Panyasantisuk)
  • Ethical AI in Refugee Support: Aligning ML with FAIR Principles (Renjun Tang) [TBC]
  • OpenEM: Open electron microscopy data in Switzerland (Spencer Bliven) [TBC]
  • Presentation of Beta Data Services & Outlook on EOSC Data Commons (Andrea Bertino) [TBC]
  • Reproducible workflows with AiiDA — The power and challenges of full data provenance (Julian Geiger + Marnik Bercx)
  • Sharing pre-publication data across institutions via an internal data catalog (Nichole Wespe)
